title: Sosoko
author: Sosoko
content: That's all you need to know.I will refund you the money in 2 months.BTC

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Sosoko on January 06, 2023, 10:24:23 PMThat's all you need to know.I will refund you the money in 2 months.BTCThe rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" - That's all you need to know.Quote from: DiamondCardz on April 20, 2014, 02:40:54 PMIf you completely ignore this sticky and make a loan request with no collateral, without having massive trust on the forum, the chances of you getting negative trusted feedback and therefore having a Trade with Extreme Caution tag is almost 100%.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: the dude is a scammer and most likely desperate for money, it would be best to ignore him. he has a bitcoin doubler post on the gambling board. not sure what he thinks will happen when he posts the most obvious scam on a forum that sees/deals with scammers on an almost daily basis.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Sosoko on January 06, 2023, 10:24:23 PMThat's all you need to know.I will refund you the money in 2 months.BTCCongratulations - that must be the shortest time for a brand new user getting negative trust feedback.(that's all you need to knowÂ   )

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Sosoko on January 06, 2023, 10:24:23 PMThat's all you need to know.I will refund you the money in 2 months.BTCYou are a great person who has found this topic from internet research and asked for a non-collateral loan. If you think you will be able to get such a loan, then why will anyone not create 100 accounts per day and why will the person not get 100 loans each day? And if get it, all the posts on the forum will be in the lending section as it is free money. Negative marked!

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: It's funny that 6 people replied here even though it's obviously a troll and OP didn't even come back here.You guys should use your time better instead of all posting the same.Enjoy your weekend guys!

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: If it takes six users to prevent a seventh from being scammed by the OP then it is worth it.
